6// Implementation of dFdy viewport transformation.
7// See header for more info.
8
9#include "compiler/translator/tree_ops/RewriteDfdy.h"
10
11#include "common/angleutils.h"
12#include "compiler/translator/StaticType.h"
13#include "compiler/translator/SymbolTable.h"
14#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermNode_util.h"
15#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermTraverse.h"
16
17namespace sh
18{
19
20namespace
21{
22
23class Traverser : public TIntermTraverser
24{
25 public:
26 ANGLE_NO_DISCARD static bool Apply(TCompiler *compiler,
27 TIntermNode *root,
28 const TSymbolTable &symbolTable,
29 TIntermBinary *flipXY,
30 TIntermTyped *fragRotation);
31
32 private:
33 Traverser(TIntermBinary *flipXY, TIntermTyped *fragRotation, TSymbolTable *symbolTable);
34 bool visitUnary(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node) override;
35
36 bool visitUnaryWithRotation(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node);
37 bool visitUnaryWithoutRotation(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node);
38
39 TIntermBinary *mFlipXY = nullptr;
40 TIntermTyped *mFragRotation = nullptr;
41};
42
43Traverser::Traverser(TIntermBinary *flipXY, TIntermTyped *fragRotation, TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
44 : TIntermTraverser(true, false, false, symbolTable),
45 mFlipXY(flipXY),
46 mFragRotation(fragRotation)
47{}
48
49// static
50bool Traverser::Apply(TCompiler *compiler,
51 TIntermNode *root,
52 const TSymbolTable &symbolTable,
53 TIntermBinary *flipXY,
54 TIntermTyped *fragRotation)
55{
56 TSymbolTable *pSymbolTable = const_cast<TSymbolTable *>(&symbolTable);
57 Traverser traverser(flipXY, fragRotation, pSymbolTable);
58 root->traverse(&traverser);
59 return traverser.updateTree(compiler, root);
60}
61
62bool Traverser::visitUnary(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node)
63{
64 if (mFragRotation)
65 {
66 return visitUnaryWithRotation(visit, node);
67 }
68 return visitUnaryWithoutRotation(visit, node);
69}
70
71bool Traverser::visitUnaryWithRotation(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node)
72{
73 // Decide if the node represents a call to dFdx() or dFdy()
74 if ((node->getOp() != EOpDFdx) && (node->getOp() != EOpDFdy))
75 {
76 return true;
77 }
78
79 // Prior to supporting Android pre-rotation, dFdy() needed to be multiplied by mFlipXY.y:
80 //
81 // correctedDfdy(operand) = dFdy(operand) * mFlipXY.y
82 //
83 // For Android pre-rotation, both dFdx() and dFdy() need to be "rotated" and multiplied by
84 // mFlipXY. "Rotation" means to swap them for 90 and 270 degrees, or to not swap them for 0
85 // and 180 degrees. This rotation is accomplished with mFragRotation, which is a 2x2 matrix
86 // used for fragment shader rotation. The 1st half (a vec2 that is either (1,0) or (0,1)) is
87 // used for rewriting dFdx() and the 2nd half (either (0,1) or (1,0)) is used for rewriting
88 // dFdy(). Otherwise, the formula for the rewrite is the same:
89 //
90 // result = ((dFdx(operand) * (mFragRotation[half] * mFlipXY).x) +
91 // (dFdy(operand) * (mFragRotation[half] * mFlipXY).y))
92 //
93 // For dFdx(), half is 0 (the 1st half). For dFdy(), half is 1 (the 2nd half). Depending on
94 // the rotation, mFragRotation[half] will cause either dFdx(operand) or dFdy(operand) to be
95 // zeroed-out. That effectively means that the above code results in the following for 0 and
96 // 180 degrees:
97 //
98 // correctedDfdx(operand) = dFdx(operand) * mFlipXY.x
99 // correctedDfdy(operand) = dFdy(operand) * mFlipXY.y
100 //
101 // and the following for 90 and 270 degrees:
102 //
103 // correctedDfdx(operand) = dFdy(operand) * mFlipXY.y
104 // correctedDfdy(operand) = dFdx(operand) * mFlipXY.x
105 //
106 // TODO(ianelliott): Look at the performance of this approach and potentially optimize it
107 // http://anglebug.com/4678
108
109 // Get a vec2 with the correct half of ANGLEUniforms.fragRotation
110 TIntermBinary *halfRotationMat = nullptr;
111 if (node->getOp() == EOpDFdx)
112 {
113 halfRotationMat =
114 new TIntermBinary(EOpIndexDirect, mFragRotation->deepCopy(), CreateIndexNode(0));
115 }
116 else
117 {
118 halfRotationMat =
119 new TIntermBinary(EOpIndexDirect, mFragRotation->deepCopy(), CreateIndexNode(1));
120 }
121
122 // Multiply halfRotationMat by ANGLEUniforms.flipXY and store in a temporary variable
123 TIntermBinary *rotatedFlipXY = new TIntermBinary(EOpMul, mFlipXY->deepCopy(), halfRotationMat);
124 const TType *vec2Type = StaticType::GetBasic<EbtFloat, 2>();
125 TIntermSymbol *tmpRotFlipXY = new TIntermSymbol(CreateTempVariable(mSymbolTable, vec2Type));
126 TIntermSequence *tmpDecl = new TIntermSequence;
127 tmpDecl->push_back(CreateTempInitDeclarationNode(&tmpRotFlipXY->variable(), rotatedFlipXY));
128 insertStatementsInParentBlock(*tmpDecl);
129
130 // Get the .x and .y swizzles to use as multipliers
131 TVector<int> swizzleOffsetX = {0};
132 TVector<int> swizzleOffsetY = {1};
133 TIntermSwizzle *multiplierX = new TIntermSwizzle(tmpRotFlipXY, swizzleOffsetX);
134 TIntermSwizzle *multiplierY = new TIntermSwizzle(tmpRotFlipXY->deepCopy(), swizzleOffsetY);
135
136 // Get the results of dFdx(operand) and dFdy(operand), and multiply them by the swizzles
137 TIntermTyped *operand = node->getOperand();
138 TIntermUnary *dFdx = new TIntermUnary(EOpDFdx, operand->deepCopy(), node->getFunction());
139 TIntermUnary *dFdy = new TIntermUnary(EOpDFdy, operand->deepCopy(), node->getFunction());
140 size_t objectSize = node->getType().getObjectSize();
141 TOperator multiplyOp = (objectSize == 1) ? EOpMul : EOpVectorTimesScalar;
142 TIntermBinary *rotatedFlippedDfdx = new TIntermBinary(multiplyOp, dFdx, multiplierX);
143 TIntermBinary *rotatedFlippedDfdy = new TIntermBinary(multiplyOp, dFdy, multiplierY);
144
145 // Sum them together into the result:
146 TIntermBinary *correctedResult =
147 new TIntermBinary(EOpAdd, rotatedFlippedDfdx, rotatedFlippedDfdy);
148
149 // Replace the old dFdx() or dFdy() node with the new node that contains the corrected value
150 queueReplacement(correctedResult, OriginalNode::IS_DROPPED);
151
152 return true;
153}
154
155bool Traverser::visitUnaryWithoutRotation(Visit visit, TIntermUnary *node)
156{
157 // Decide if the node represents a call to dFdy()
158 if (node->getOp() != EOpDFdy)
159 {
160 return true;
161 }
162
163 // Copy the dFdy node so we can replace it with the corrected value
164 TIntermUnary *newDfdy = node->deepCopy()->getAsUnaryNode();
165
166 size_t objectSize = node->getType().getObjectSize();
167 TOperator multiplyOp = (objectSize == 1) ? EOpMul : EOpVectorTimesScalar;
168
169 TIntermBinary *flipY =
170 new TIntermBinary(EOpIndexDirect, mFlipXY->deepCopy(), CreateIndexNode(1));
171 // Correct dFdy()'s value:
172 // (dFdy() * mFlipXY.y)
173 TIntermBinary *correctedDfdy = new TIntermBinary(multiplyOp, newDfdy, flipY);
174
175 // Replace the old dFdy node with the new node that contains the corrected value
176 queueReplacement(correctedDfdy, OriginalNode::IS_DROPPED);
177
178 return true;
179}
180
181} // anonymous namespace
182
183bool RewriteDfdy(TCompiler *compiler,
184 TIntermNode *root,
185 const TSymbolTable &symbolTable,
186 int shaderVersion,
187 TIntermBinary *flipXY,
188 TIntermTyped *fragRotation)
189{
190 // dFdy is only valid in GLSL 3.0 and later.
191 if (shaderVersion < 300)
192 return true;
193
194 return Traverser::Apply(compiler, root, symbolTable, flipXY, fragRotation);
195}
196
197} // namespace sh
